alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 4:40PM CDT until April 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County. For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconto River above Oconto. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood waters begin to spread into a public campground in the City of Oconto. Water approaches the backyards of several homes along the river in Oconto...and there is widespread lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening, cresting at 9.1 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage during the day Sunday. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
